headline: Does Ross Stores’ Off-Price Expansion and Same-Store Sales Momentum Reframe Its Growth Story for ROST?
summary: In recent days, Ross Stores has drawn renewed attention as multiple Wall Street analysts reiterated positive views while the company continued expanding its off-price footprint across underpenetrated markets. Beneath the headlines, Ross’s combination of consistent same-store sales growth, strong return on capital and an accelerating store rollout underscores how its off-price model is being used to pursue new growth opportunities. We’ll now examine how Ross’s expansion push, backed by...
